[[Version 2.2]]
* Fixes an issue with the Raiden Shogun whereby the Cooldown reduction effect would be incorrectly displayed on party members' Elemental Skill button when she triggers her Lv. 6 Constellation effect (Elemental Burst CD display and actual CD reduction effects of party members work as intended).

[[Version 2.1]]
*Wishbearer was released.
*The description was updated within a day of its release.
**{{Color|Old Description}}: While in the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, the Raiden Shogun's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will decrease all nearby party members' (but not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
**{{Color|New Description}}: While in the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, '''attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst''' will decrease all nearby party members' (but not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
